item.title: Neema CEO: Marshall Islands Digital Currency Needs Work to Satisfy US Regulatory Concerns - Cointelegraph Puntaje: 1300
item.description: The Marshall Islands’ government upcoming digital currency still needs work in order to placate U.S. financial regulators

item.title: AI could help identify Civil War veterans in your family - Fox News technology Puntaje: 800
item.description: A computer science professor has built a tool that could allow you to identify Civil War veterans in your help with the help of artificial intelligence.
